title: Miracle Stain
post:
One thing this commercial indicates is that there is a broader awareness of the Shroud than some might expect. I had breakfast with a client the other day who is relatively young <35 and when I mentioned my project to him, he went-off on the screwed-up C-14 and how they carbon dated the wrong part etc. I was surprised.
(Incidentally, the issue arose when he complained that he had fallen walking his dog and had some painful bruises. Maybe I should rename my dog Bogie, "Prophet?" Nah.)
author: John Klotz
